title: RIP

replies.body: Maybe...don't play Sion? He's not really solo carry material because his abilities work best when the others on your team know what you are doing, how to best use your ult to their advantage etc.

Maybe... don't worry about how much a champion can "carry" and you'll get out of Bronze? You can carry with any champion in low Elo, Sion is just fine. What you have to focus on instead of the champion you pick is learning the basics of the game.

Protip: supporty champions and tanks are one of the easiest ways to get out of Bronze for someone who's %%%%, since they put you in a position where you have to learn the basics of the game or else you'll be useless.

Just don't go full damage - at least get something like TriForce or Hydra or BotRK. Going full tank leaves too much responsibility in the hands of 4 randoms - at least too much for me to trust them with.
Youmus is interesting on sion. Makes his passive useful, armpen is good for his stupid base dmg, and his crit animation is too good.
